title: HA0-QI538-PARKLAND TURNER RECREATION CENTER
description: DPR is partnering with DCHA, DCPL, and DCPS to realize the most comprehensive campus co-location project in the District. This project proposes a new recreation center to be co-located with a new elementary school and library at the corner of a major intersection in Ward 8 that will connect several new housing developments in the area. DCPS is the lead agency on this project. The scope of work for this project will include but not be limited to: (1) public consultations; (2) examination of the existing conditions; (3) construction document preparation; (4) field inspections; (5) design and construction of a new state-of-the-art ADA-compliant facility; and (6) construction of site amenities, parking and lighting.
justification: This is a partnership project that will add to the value of a new elementary school and library.
progress_assessment: DPR portions of the facility will be completed by summer 2010.
